English.Text: Your luck is dreadful, and you are so preoccupied with the roulette wheel, you fail to notice that your Queen is indeed present. Suddenly a silence falls, and the Prince of Monégasque himself— a man with an improbably thin moustache, makes a long speech about how the casino will bring back the good times for the Piedmont family. "And finally, I notice we have a special guest," he smiles, at which a sequined elephant promptly rushes for the door, "but, oh your majesty, wait!!" But by the time you have forced your way outside, her carriage has set off at speed. You wave another cab down, and get in.
